title: Website Development
shortDescription: Professional responsive website using modern tools.
description: I will create a fully responsive and modern website using React, Tailwind CSS, and clean UI design. Suitable for businesses, portfolios, and startups.

title: UI/UX Design
shortDescription: Creative UI/UX design for mobile & web.
description: I will design clean, user-friendly, and modern UI/UX using Figma. Perfect for apps, websites, and dashboards.

title: React Bug Fixing
description: I will debug and fix issues in your React app including state issues, UI bugs, and performance optimization.

title: SEO Optimization
description: On-page SEO optimization including keyword research, meta tags, speed improvement, and optimization tips.

title: Social Media Management
description: Manage posts, captions, and engagement on social platforms to grow your brand organically.

title: Mobile App UI Design
description: Design clean mobile app interfaces for Android & iOS with best UI principles.
